entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 later in the morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
